did.unittitle: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. Mary Lewis Smith papers (series 68)

bioghist.p: Mary Lewis Smith (1808-1892) was the wife of the judge, scientist, and state senator Dr. George L. Smith and the great grandmother of Lawrence M. C. Smith. Their children were Abraham Lewis (1831-1914), Mary (1834-1885), Rebecca (1836-1856), Margaretta (1838-1915), Benjamin Hayes (1841-1918), Clement Lawrence (1844-1909), George, Jr. (1846-1872), and Richard Hayes (1852-1856).

scopecontent.p: This collection includes various items belonging to Mary Smith, including recipe and receipt books, a cash book, school penmanship books, and photographs. The collection also includes letters written to Mary Smith from Rebecca L. Smith, L.K. Lawrence and others. There is also a published volume entitled A Treatise of Domestic Medicine (1824).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
